## ModalComponentBaseProps.clickoutside property

whether to dismiss modal when clicking outside. Most useful when you want to not have a backdrop but still dismiss modal when clicking outside the modal. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

Can be provided as boolean or the parameter object to [@svelte-put/clickoutside](https://github.com/vnphanquang/svelte-put/blob/main/packages/clickoutside/api/docs/clickoutside.clickoutsideparameters.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
clickoutside?: boolean | ClickOutsideParameters;
```
